efac:Change.efbc:ChangeDescription: Clarification response date changed from 11th January 2024 to 1st February 2024. Tender deadline response date changed from 18th January 2024 to 8th February 2024

cac:SpecificTendererRequirement.cbc:Description: Please refer to Section 2.3 of tender response document.

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: ATU Multi Party Framework Agreement for Supply of Equipment to Faculty of Science
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The Atlantic Technological University (ATU) wishes to establish a Multi Operator Framework Agreement for the supply of Scientific Laboratory Equipment for teaching and learning purposes for undergraduate and postgraduate programmes delivered by the Faculty of Science at Atlantic Technological University, Sligo and also at ATU Donegal. ATU Galway-Mayo and ATU St. Angela’s College Sligo. The initial contract will be for the supply of equipment for new Science laboratories which are part of a 4,381 square metre new extension to the existing Science block at ATU Sligo’s campus. The contract will be divided into 7 Lots as listed in the Request for Tender document. The initial contracts will be awarded to first ranked framework member in each Lot. Additional call-off contracts may be awarded as and when required by ATU. Tenderers may apply for one or all lots. Full details are in the tender documents published.
